lyrics: Are you sick of me?
Would you like to be?
I'm trying to tell you something
Something that I already said
You like a pretty boy
With a pretty voice
Who is trying to sell you something
Something that you already have
But if you're too drunk to drive, and the music is right
She might let you stay, but just for the night
And if she grabs for your hand, and drags you along
She might want a kiss before the end of this song
Because love can burn like a cigarette
And leave you with nothing
And leave you with nothing
While the others talked
We were listenin' to Lover's Rock
In her bedroom
In her bedroom
And if you start to kiss
And the record skips
Flip it over
And sit a little closer
But if you're too drunk to drive, and the music is right
She might let you stay, but just for the night
And if she grabs for your hand, and drags you along
She might want a kiss before the end of this song
Because love can burn like a cigarette
And leave you with nothing
And leave you with nothing
Now, how many men have you kissed?
Very few
But you offered me a kiss, why?
Such a foolish reason, I'm afraid
I just wanted to kiss you
Do-do, do-do-do-do-do
Do-do, do-do-do-do-do
Do-do, do-do-do-do-do
Do-do, do-do-do-do-do
Because love can burn like a cigarette (do-do, do-do-do-do-do)
And leave you alone with nothing (do-do, do-do-do-do-do)
And leave you alone with nothing (do)
translations: Který se ti snaží něco prodat
Ale když jsi moc opilej na řízení a hudba hraje správně
Možná tě nechá zůstat, ale jen na jednu noc
A když tě chytne za ruku a zatáhne tě s sebou
Možná bude chtít pusu, než tahle písnička skončí
Protože láska může hořet jako cigareta
Ale když jsi moc opilej na řízení a hudba hraje správně
Možná tě nechá zůstat, ale jen na jednu noc
A když tě chytne za ruku a zatáhne tě s sebou
Možná bude chtít pusu, než tahle písnička skončí
Protože láska může hořet jako cigareta
Tak kolik mužů jsi už políbila?
Ale nabídla jsi pusu mně, proč?
Obávám se, že to byl hloupý důvod
Protože láska může hořet jako cigareta (do-do, do-do-do-do-do)
A nechat tě samotného s ničím (do-do, do-do-do-do-do)
A nechat tě samotného s ničím (do)
